LanguageData.VQED_GeneralAwakensText:
The sealed sarcophagus hisses open, releasing a cloud of deadlife dust, and from within rises {PAWN_title} {PAWN_nameFull}.
Once the commander of the Enclave's Operation: Deadlife, {PAWN_nameFull} is now a ghoul remnant of a forgotten war. As {PAWN_pronoun} awakens, {PAWN_pronoun} begin reactivating the baseâ€™s long-dormant defense systems: rotstink vents, turret grids, shambler kennels, and containment pits filled with the dead.
{PAWN_possessive} ultimate goal is clear: to initiate the launch sequence for the Deadlife ICBMs: orbital warheads designed to blanket the planet in death. If launched, feral ghouls hordes will rise across the world, destroying settlements and ambushing caravans.
You must reach the command center and destroy the ICBM Launch Terminal before {PAWN_nameFull} completes {PAWN_possessive} grim task.
LanguageData.VQED_FactionBaseOverrun: {0} has been overrun by a horde of feral ghouls.
LanguageData.VQED_ShamblersDefeated: The feral ghoul horde has been defeated.
LanguageData.VQED_GeneralReactivatedDeadlifeVents: To protect the launch site, General {0} reactivated the deadlife vents in an attempt to respawn any defeated feral ghouls.
